objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0c0c0dbf'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#000000'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGrad' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#6e6e6e' stop-opacity='0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#000000' stop-opacity='0.1'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalGrad)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L0 1080 Z' fill='#f9f8f6' opacity='0.03'/><path d='M1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#accentGrad)'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='100' fill='#f9f8f6' opacity='0.02'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='150' fill='#0374a5' opacity='0.05'/><path d='M1080,0 L0,1080' stroke='#f9f8f6' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M1080,150 L150,1080' stroke='#f9f8f6' stroke-width='0.5' opacity='0.07'/><path d='M1080,300 L300,1080' stroke='#f9f8f6' stroke-width='0.5' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text:
Spacious Stylish Design
Durable Faux Leather
Perfect Everyday Size
Gold Metal Accents

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner features a high-contrast, fashion-forward design for a women's tote bag sale. The background utilizes a diagonal black gradient with subtle geometric overlays, creating a sense of depth and sophistication. Bold, uppercase text layers identified as `heading_1` and `heading_2` introduce the brand name prominently at the top in a condensed, serif font. Below it, `subheading` clarifies the product type in a clean, sans-serif font. The `description` text highlights key product features in a smaller font, while a thin blue rectangle labeled `decorative` adds emphasis above it. The price is boldly showcased in `price`, and a rectangular `cta_background` houses a call-to-action (`cta`) button urging immediate engagement. A high-quality image of the bag, labeled `product_image`, is placed on the right, creating visual balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: `#000000` (background gradient)
- Off-White: `#f9f8f6` (text elements)
- Blue Accent: `#0374a5` (line & CTA button)
- Rich Tan: From the bag image (visual focus)
product_color: The product showcases a sophisticated and elegant color palette that centers around a warm camel brown (#B57F61) as the main hue for the handbag. This dominant color delivers a luxurious and timeless feel. Accents in metallic gold (#D4AF37) appear in the hardware—such as the chain, buckles, and decorative charms—providing contrast and enhancing sophistication. The ALDO logo also utilizes this gold, blending harmoniously with the brown while simultaneously standing out. The subtle texture of the leather amplifies the depth, making the two-tone palette visually compelling. For an ad banner, complementary tones like ivory (#F8F5F0) and soft taupe (#D2B6A2) would enhance elegance and elevate design appeal.
